trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> for the grip of a horizontal scroll box (also known as the thumb).
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> per il riquadro di una casella di scorrimento orizzontale, anche nota come pulsante di scorrimento.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the grip of a horizontal scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal> classe restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> che rappresenta il riquadro di una casella di scorrimento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarGripperHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Handle del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate di `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarGripperHorizontal1` metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents a grip for a horizontal scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elemento dello stile di visualizzazione che rappresenta un riquadro per una casella di scorrimento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents a grip for a horizontal scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> che rappresenta un riquadro per una casella di scorrimento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> proprietà per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarGripperHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Handle del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate di `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarGripperHorizontal1` metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
